mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sfree(studyNum, userId, fSubject, fContent, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (#{studyNum}, #{userId}, #{fSubject}, #{fContent} , #{saveFilename} , #{originalFilename})
mapper.select:
SELECT sFreeNum, studyNum, userId, fSubject, fContent, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created FROM sfree
ORDER BY sFreeNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT sFreeNum, studyNum, userId, fSubject, fContent, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created FROM sfree WHERE sFreeNum=#{sFreeNum}

SELECT sFreeNum, fSubject FROM sfree
AND (sFreeNum > #{sFreeNum})
ORDER BY sFreeNum ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT sFreeNum, fSubject FROM sfree
AND (sFreeNum < #{sFreeNum})
ORDER BY sFreeNum DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sfree SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE sFreeNum=#{sFreeNum}
